green-day_one-default.text: Of course! Right when I'm about to use up some well-deserved vacation time, I get called in for this shit. Unbelievable
green-day_one-default.speaker: green

green-day_one-default.text: Let's get this charade over with. I have places to be
green-day_one-default.speaker: green

meeting_day_one-yes.text: (You have decided to sacrifice innocent lives to try to stop the moon)
meeting_day_one-yes.speaker: green

meeting_day_one-no.text: (You have decided to not sacrifice innocent lives)
meeting_day_one-no.speaker: green
